name: Patricia Wagaman
text: My pizza was great and it was ready when I went to pick it up.  I loved the $10 large pizza deal.

text: This store is hit or miss. Today was a big miss! Just look at the atrocity they delivered tonight. A little cheese, chicken, bacon, and spinach floating in a pool of garlic parmesean sauce. The pizza was dripping and soggy.
